title: Masked men claiming to represent Mexico's most powerful cartel threaten to kill national TV news anchor in video message
content:
1. Masked men claiming to represent Mexico's most powerful cartel threaten to kill national TV news anchor in video message  CBS News
  2. Mexican drug cartel threatens to kill TV reporter  BBC News
  3. Mexican cartel threatens to kill TV news anchor over ‘unfair’ coverage  The Guardian
  4. ‘I will make you eat your words’: Mexican drug cartel threatens to kill news anchor for ‘unfair coverage’  The Independent
  5. Masked man threatens to kill national news presenter in Mexico  Euronews
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: メキシコ最強のカルテルを名乗る覆面の男たちが全国ネットのニュースキャスターの殺害を予告するビデオメッセージを公開
声称代表墨西哥最强大的贩毒集团的蒙面人在视频信息中威胁要杀死国家电视新闻主播
